overview: “Creatures of the Wind” blurs the frontier between nightmare and reality in a dreamlike journey with a teenage girl. Visions follow one another in this horror-style short, with a polished aesthetic mixing black and white costumes, shoulder camera shots in a dense dark forest, and an ominous children’s song. The forest appears as a prison hiding one’s most personal fears, anthropomorphized in seemingly inescapable apparitions.
title: Creatures of the Wind
